Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add SlabNFTManager contract and wire to PokeballGame v1.1.0

SlabNFTManager Contract:
- UUPS upgradeable proxy pattern for NFT inventory management
- Auto-purchase NFTs from SlabMachine when USDC.e >= $51 threshold
- Max 10 NFTs in inventory with FIFO award system
- ERC721Receiver for receiving NFTs from SlabMachine
- Owner functions: pause/unpause, emergency withdraw, set addresses

PokeballGame v1.1.0 Updates:
- Integrated ISlabNFTManager interface for NFT delegation
- Revenue flow: 97% to SlabNFTManager via depositRevenue\(\)
- Catch rewards: awardNFTToWinner\(\) called on successful catch
- Removed internal NFT inventory \(now managed by SlabNFTManager\)
- Added setSlabNFTManager\(\) setter and RevenueSentToManager event

Files Added:
- contracts/SlabNFTManager.sol
- contracts/abi/abi_SlabNFTManager.json
- contracts/deployment/deploy_SlabNFTManager.js

Files Updated:
- contracts/PokeballGame.sol \(v1.1.0\)
- contracts/abi/abi_PokeballGame.json \(v1.1.0\)
- contracts/deployment/deploy_PokeballGame.js \(v1.1.0\)
- CLAUDE.md \(added SlabNFTManager documentation\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
